note:
manufacturer of high-quality
Revankar Vaibhav Jewellers is a renowned manufacturer of exquisite gold, diamond, platinum, and silver ornaments and real gems. Our company has been in the wholesale and retail business for over 20 years, serving customers in Bengaluru and Hyderabad with the highest quality jewelry. Our mission is to provide our customers with a wide range of beautiful, unique and high-quality jewelry that will last a lifetime.
